Import alert against Divi’s Laboratories may be more than just ‘procedural’TCS’ U.K.-based subsidiary Diligenta secured a 15-year deal from Scottish WidowsAurobindo Pharma received Form 483 with 2 observations from the U.S. FDABlue Star forays into engineering facility management TVS Motor says Jupiter scooter sales crossed two million-mark in four years






The Singapore-traded SGX Nifty, an early indicator of Nifty 50 Index’s performance in India, rose 0.3 to 9,884 as of 8:05 a.m.

title: Stocks To Watch: Blue Star, Dabur, United Spirits, TVS Motors, TCS
